resources.string: \n WINJER, we bring you domain expertise in Facilities Management Service and Contract Staffing Service. Our service are designed to suit your business requirements and we align them to your corporate strategy and work philosophy. Having catered to renowned companies in India, we have gained the repute of delivering superior quality service that match international standards.\n With a uniform work culture and healthy corporate ethics we extend our services cross all management levels within the organization right from the low end support system to the top-of-the line management.
